completeRegistration.title: Complete Registration
completeRegistration.emailDesc: Your Email address is your identifer, when you are redirected after buying tickets from any Ticket Platform. If you use different email addresses on Ticket selling platforms we recommend to add them here.

errors.passwordAndConfirmDidntMatch: Password and Confirm Password didn't match.
errors.passwordMustIncludeUpperCaseLetter: Password must include at least 1 upper case letter.
errors.passwordMustIncludeLowerCaseLetter: Password must include at least 1 lower case letter.
errors.passwordMustIncludeDigit: Password must include at least 1 digit.
errors.passwordLength: Password must consist of min. 6 characters.
errors.invalidEmail: Email must be a valid email address
errors.emailAlreadyRegistered: An account with email is already existing! If you forgot your password, please use the password recovery link.
errors.generalError: Error has occured! Please try again!

support.workingHours: Monday - Friday 9:00 - 17:00 After business hours and weekends please contact us via email.

list.title: Ticket Personalization
list.noTickets: There are no tickets to display!

assignTicket.notes: The participant is a minor or does not have a FanSafe account and would like the buyer to manage his/her tickets. Create a
assignTicket.notesPopUp:
- A main account owner can manage up to 4 people.
- The main account owner must already have performed an ID check in order to create a Linked Account.
- Persons with a Linked Account also have to perform an one-time ID check.
- Linked accounts need to be setup with first and last name and username.
- Linked accounts can only be deleted by FanSafe Support.

labels.title: Create new account
labels.verifyLinkedText: Please verify the identity of the linked account user! by clicking the ID Check Button.

labels.linkedNotice: As a Linked account user you can set a password and login to your private account with your username and password

text.notice1: You currently have no linked accounts. You are able to connect up to 4 accounts with your main account and administrate the tickets for these persons.
text.notice2: Using a linked account also requires an ID Check of this person, which has to be performed within the main account.

labels.changeStandardEmail: Please enter your account password to change your standard email address

placeholders.addAditionalEmail: Add additional emails here, if you are registered on a ticket portal with an email other than your FanSafe standard email

labels.notice: In order to offer you fastest and most secure transactions Fansafe uses Stripe Connect Payment services. As soon as you have performed a valid ID Check you are able to provide the proof of address and your IBAN by clicking the button below. Payouts will automatically be transferred to your bank account as soon as stripe frees the amount.
labels.dataInChecking: Your data are in checking proccess
labels.provideAddressProof: Provide Proof of address and Bank account

proofOfAddress.termsAndCond: By entering the data you agree to the terms and conditions and the privacy policy of Stripe and Fansafe
proofOfAddress.pleaseProvideBankAccountData: Please provide your bank account data
proofOfAddress.pleaseUploadDoc: Please upload a document to prove your address
proofOfAddress.uploadDocInfo: You can use a Confirmation of registration or an Electricity bill or a Gas bill
proofOfAddress.noteDesc: Your name must be on electricity or gas bill
proofOfAddress.verificationSuccessful: We have received your data! It may take a couple of minutes until we've verifed your account. You can close this window now!

list.noTickets: There are no tickets to display!

edit.title: Edit Ticket
edit.invalidPriceMessage: The price must not exceed the original price!
edit.note: Ticket offered for sales are placed on the FanSafe marketplace according to your settings. Tickets on offer can be changed subsequently in the "My sales" menu. The buyer remains unknown to the seller. As soon as the ticket has been sold, the seller receives an email and the payment is made through Stripe directly to the seller's Stripe account. If the ticket is not sold, there is no entitlement to a refund of the purchase price.
edit.removeAdInfo:
Your Ad will be removed from the Marketplace and assigned back to you!
Are you sure you want to delete the Ad from the Marketplace?

buyTicket.title: Buy Ticket
buyTicket.successMessage:
We have received your payment!
The tickets are now available in your Fansafe account!

auth.passwordRecovery: Password recovery request is successfully submitted. Please check your email for password recovery link.

cardPayment.cardSubmitedSuccessfuly: Credit Card details are submitted successfully, please wait for payment to be confirmed.

marketplace.ticketRemovedFromSale: Ticket removed from my sales successfuly!

idVerification.title: ID Verification
idVerification.idVerifReasons: We need to verify your ID in order to
idVerification.reason1: ensure trouble-free entry with your personalized ticket
idVerification.reason2: ensure that you are able to assign tickets to other users
idVerification.reason3: payout your sales from the Fansafe Marketplace
idVerification.pleasePrepareDocs: Please prepare following documents before you start the verifcation process
idVerification.doc1: ID Document (Passport or Driver License or Personal ID Card)
idVerification.doc2: Selfe image (Frontal view, without sunglasses, headgear, mask etc.)
idVerification.chooseIdDoc: Please choose the ID document you will use for the verifcation process
idVerification.pleaseUploadPassport: If you have a copy of your ID Document on your Computer please upload your Passport
idVerification.pleaseUploadDriverLicense: If you have a copy of your ID Document on your Computer please upload your Driver's License
idVerification.pleaseUploadIdCard: If you have a copy of your ID Document on your Computer please upload your Personal ID Card
idVerification.scanQR: Scan the QR Code to continue the verifcation process on your mobile
idVerification.noteDesc: If you have an older iPhone or Android phone you might need 3rd party QR scanning apps. Please check out
idVerification.pleaseTakeSelfie: Please take a selfe image with the webcam
idVerification.takeSelfie: Take a selfie image with webcam
idVerification.uploadSelfie: Upload a selfie image from your computer
idVerification.noteSelfieDesc: Frontal view recommended, don't wear sunglasses or any headgear
idVerification.uploadSelfieButton: Upload a selfie image from your computer
idVerification.verificationSuccessful: We have received your data! It may take a couple of minutes until we've verifed your account. You can close this window now!
idVerification.pleaseTakeAPictureOfPassport: Please take a picture of the passport (photo page)
idVerification.takeAPictureNote1: Ensure data is clearly visible and readable
idVerification.takeAPictureNote4: Ensure there are good light conditions
idVerification.pleaseTakeAPictureOfDriversLicense: Please take a picture of the Driver's License (Front and Back)
idVerification.takeAPictureOfDriversLicenseFront: Step 1: Take picture of Driver's License front side
idVerification.takeAPictureOfDriversLicenseBack: Step 2: Take picture of your Driver's License back side
idVerification.pleaseTakeAPictureOfIdCard: Please take a picture of the ID Card (Front and Back)
idVerification.takeAPictureOfIdCardFront: Step 1: Take picture of ID Card front side
idVerification.takeAPictureOfIdCardBack: Step 2: Take picture of your ID Card back side
idVerification.takeASelfiePictureNote1: Ensure there are good light conditions
idVerification.takeASelfiePictureNote2: Ensure your face is fully visible
idVerification.takeASelfiePictureNote3: Ensure you do not wear sunglasses or headgear
idVerification.uploadSelfieMobile: Upload a selfie image from your phone
idVerification.uploadSelfieMobileNote: Frontal view recommended, don't wear sunglasses or any headgear
idVerification.uploadSelfieMobileButton: Upload a selfie image from your phone

labels.backSideTitle: Please refer to the following guidlines
labels.backSideText: The terms and conditions of the organizer apply. Tickets are personalized and only the ticket holder is entitled to participate in the event. Tickets may only be resold via Fansafe at the original price or lower. Re-personalizations are only possible via Fansafe.

labels.title: Re-personalize Ticket
labels.rePersonalizeNotice: The new Ticket Holder already must be registered with FanSafe. Please enter the username or email in the field below!
labels.nonExistingUser: User does not exist! Please take care of upper case - lower case writing!
labels.notice:
A ticket can only be re-personalized once by the ticket owner.
Selling the ticket at a higher price is not permitted and will be prosecuted. Violations can lead suspension of your account.
labels.acceptRequired: You need to accept Terms to continue

placeholders.enterUsername: Enter FanSafe Username or Email address

labels.title: Return Ticket
labels.notice: The entire processing of the refund is carried out by the ticket seller and Fansafe has no influence on this. Canceled tickets are reactivated for sale in the booking system of the ticket seller and your reservation is deleted. Your ticket will also be removed from your Fansafe account. As soon as the ticket has been sold, you will receive the original ticket price back. Neither Fansafe nor the ticket seller guarantee that the ticket will be sold. If the ticket is not sold, there is no right for a refund.
labels.terms: You need to accept Terms and Conditions

placeholders.returnReason: Please choose a reason for return

labels.title: Sell Ticket
labels.notice: Tickets offered for sale are placed on the FanSafe marketplace according to your settings. Tickets on offer can be changed subsequently in the My sales menu. The buyer remains unknown to the seller. As soon as the ticket has been sold, the seller receives an email and the payment is made through Stripe directly to the seller's Stripe account. If the ticket is not sold, there is no entitlement to a refund of the purchase price.

labels.noTickets: There are no tickets to display!
There are no tickets to display!
